data.title: Mammootty
data.meta_description: Muhammad Kutty Panaparambil Ismail, (born 7 September 1951), better known by his stage name Mammootty, is an Indian actor and film producer who works predominantly in Malayalam cinema. In a career spanning five decades, he has acted in over 400 films, mainly in Malayalam, with several in Tamil...
data.text:
Muhammad Kutty Panaparambil Ismail, (born 7 September 1951), better known by his stage name Mammootty, is an Indian actor and film producer who works predominantly in Malayalam cinema. In a career spanning five decades, he has acted in over 400 films, mainly in Malayalam, with several in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Hindi and English.
